channel.title: Patcher Wish - Sort by Type
channel.description:
There's enough great objects being made by the community that I'm starting to get lost bouncing around people's names - it's be great if there was a way to define something like a group of "favorites" lists I can use to quickly navigate to frequently-used objects.
I didn't see a more sensical place to put this, if it should go somewhere else just let me know.

item.title: Patcher Wish - Sort by Type

item.description:

http://community.axoloti.com/t/improvements-wishes-for-the-patcher

sensical a better place to post wishes for the patcher
